FuncDef:
The client-option38 command enables the device to trust the information in the Option 38 field of DHCPv6 messages sent by the client.
The undo client-option38 command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device does not trust the information in the Option 38 field of DHCPv6 messages sent by the client.

ParaDef.Info:
encapsulates Option 38 information into a DHCP packet with user mac information.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the client-option38 command is run, the server trusts the information in the Option 38 field of DHCPv6 messages sent by the client and sends the information in the Option 38 field to the RADIUS server. Option38 functions the same as the subscriber-id of Option 82 in DHCPv4.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
